boardgame.name: Grain and Bones
Korn og Knogler
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Grain and Bones - A Vaesen Mystery about Trolls brings the Society to Denmark on behalf of a nisse as dark forces threatens a local farm community with famine and murder. Cursed with a deadly desire for Troll Gold the farmers are willing take it one step too far. Can the Society stop the tragedy in time?

The Mystery takes place near Ravnholm Estate but can easily be placed near Gyllencreutz or other parts of Scandinavia.

The Mystery combines Danish folklore and history with Scandinavian legends to create a new kind of challenge for the Society, where trickery and diplomacy becomes valued skills if a terrible curse is to be brought to an end.

The adventure can be played in 1-2 sessions.

boardgame.name: Skelflytterne fra Linnamannsland
The Skelflytters from Linnamannsland
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Skelflytters or The Fence Ghasts from Linnamannsland - A Vaesen Mystery is an adventure exploring the border between the old and new in a small Swedish village, as a terrible monster haunts the construction site of a railroad, and the villagers are powerless to undo the misdeeds of the past.

The adventure tales a deep dive in Scandinavian folklore and traditions to create a strange and challenging tale for the investigators. The mystery is based around a new type of Vaesen. You can learn more about the Skelflytter here.

The adventure can be played in 1-2 sessions.
boardgame.rpgitemversion: The Skelflytters from Linnamannsland PDF Version

boardgame.name: Revenge of the Elf King
Smørfejden på Stevns
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Elf King's Revenge or The Butter Feud - A Vaesen Mystery brings the Society to Denmark in an attempt to end a feud among cursed farmers from spiralling out of control. Shadowy forces and an ancient Vaesen is behind the conflict, and if not careful the investigators may be lost forever.

The adventure explores forgotten beliefs and traditions in Danish folklore and history to create a fun and challenging tale for the investigators. The mystery is based around a new type of Vaesen and on the mysteries of Butter Witchcraft.

The adventure can be played in 2 sessions.
boardgame.rpgitemversion: Revenge of the Elf King PDF Version

boardgame.name: Skelflytter
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Skelflytter is a new crreature for the Vaesen - Nordic Horror Roleplaying to use in your mysteries. The skelflytter is known from Scandinavian folklore, and it is based on Danish folklore collected in the 19th and early 20th century by folklorists. It is here adapted for Vaesen - Nordic Horror Roleplaying.

The Skelflytter or 'fence ghast' as we chosen to call it is a supernatural being, whose presence signifies the existence of misdeeds unresolved.

The Skelflytter appears in The Skelflytters from Linnamannsland.

boardgame.name: Ravnholm Estate
Ravnholm Gods
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Ravnholm Estate is a supplement for Vaesen: Nordic Horror Roleplaying with a new headquarter for the players to use as an alternative to Castle Gyllencreutz in Uppsala, Sweden. Ravnholm Estate lies north of Copenhagen, Denmark, and it belongs to the enigmatic Tårnskytte family who are old allies of the Society. Which mysteries are hidden here?

Ravnholm Estate introduces a new base of operations including new facilities and new interpretations of the existing facilities as well as new types or staff and new threats specifically tied to the estate. The document also contains the official history of the Tårnskytte family. They are an old family of hunters dedicated to hunting vaesen.

The Tårnskytte family appears in Revenge of the Elf King.


Ravnholm gods er et supplement til Vaesen: Nordic Horror Roleplaying med en ny base til spillerne som alternativ til Gyllencreutz slottet i Uppsala. Godset ligger i Nordsjælland og tilhører den enigmatiske Tårnskytte slægt, som har stillet godset til rådighed for Selskabet.

Ravnholm gods introducerer en ny base, som inkluderer nye faciliteter, nye tolkninger af de eksisterende samt nyt personale og et sæt trusler særligt tilpasset godset foruden den officielle historie om slægten Tårnskytte.

Mysteriet Korn og Knogler udspiller sig lige ved siden af Ravnholm gods.

boardgame.name: The Troll in The Well
The Troll, The Man, and The Hag in the Well
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Troll in The Well - Brøndtrolden (Danish) or Brunngubbe (Swedish) - is based on Scandinavian superstitions and customs of the 19th and 20th century, and here presented as a vaesen to be used in the mysteries and adventures. It is the manifested fears of wells and ponds, and the dangers that lurk there.

This supplement for the Vaesen - Nordic Horror Roleplaying introduces a new creature based on wells and the boogieman invoked around wells.
boardgame.rpgitemversion: The Troll in The Well PDF
The Troll, The Man, and The Hag in the Well PDF

boardgame.name: Smørheks/Butter Witch
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Butter Witch is a based on Danish folklore and superstitions from the 19th and early 20th century around butter and butter churning. Butter was an important commodity in the Scandinavian rural society and was exported in large amounts from the middle ages to the present day - but butter was also difficult to get right, and there was many beliefs about using magic to steal butter as well as about witches churning magical butter.

This supplement for the Vaesen - Nordic Horror Roleplaying introduces a new creature to the game centered around the magic and superstitions regarding butter.

boardgame.name: Kiss the Frog
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Kiss the Frog contains more than 20 strange, fortuitous or weird effects that will surprise any adventurer daring to kiss a frog - and yet they may be lucky.

boardgame.name: Tårnet i skoven
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

inspired by the greatest roleplaying game of all time.
Tårnet i skoven takes the adventurers to a small tower hidden deep in the forest, that might reveal an important treasure in the upcoming fight against the Dragon.

The module is in Danish, and it is written for the roleplaying game Hinterlandet, a D&D-inspired OSR game.

boardgame.name: Den syngende vinds tempel
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The third module in the Dragon Valley campaign for Hinterlandet - A Danish OSR RPG inspired by the greatest roleplaying game of all time.

Den syngende vinds tempel is an ancient temple long lain forgotten and home to the singing statues and living shadows guading a forgotten grave, that may reveal a long forgotten truth about the Dragon.

The module is in Danish, and it is written for the roleplaying game Hinterlandet, a D&D-inspired OSR game.

boardgame.name: Porten til Drømmeriget
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The second module in the Dragon Valley campaign for Hinterlandet - A Danish OSR RPG inspired by the greatest roleplaying game of all time.

Porten til Drømmeriget is a haunted series of caves hiding an anciet grave, but they placed the grave too close the realm of dreams, and mysterious and lethal forces has been leaking through! Daring adventurers might win a treasure enabling them to defeat the Dragon.

The module is in Danish, and it is written for the roleplaying game Hinterlandet, a D&D-inspired OSR game.

boardgame.name: Regelheftet til Hinterlandet
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Velkommen til næsten Dungeons & Dragons
...
I dette hefte finder du reglerne til spillet, som dækker rejser og kampe, møder med andre og trolddom, og en gennemgang af de syv karakterer, man kan vælge, samt deres særlige evner og udstyr.

boardgame.name: Spillederens vejledning til Hinterlandet
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Hinterlandet består af et sæt regler med dertilhørende tillæg og et hulesystem. Hulesystemet er den tekst, du skal kende bedst, for det er scenariet, I skal spille. Regelsystemet er det værktøj, som I arbejder med, når I spiller, og det er en retro-klon af D&D, så hvis du allerede er bekendt med Dungeons & Dragons eller Pathfinder, kender du allerede kernen i regelsystemet. Til regelsystemet er en masse ekstra materiale i form af beskrivelser af evner, trylleformularer, magiske skatte, karakterer osv. Dem behøver du ikke at kende grundigt, da kun de dele, som er til rådighed for spillerne, mens I spiller, har relevans for jer. Du behøver derfor ikke studere hver en evne eller trylleformular grundigt.

boardgame.name: Den store bog om monstre, uhyrer og andre væsner i Hinterlandet
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Kategorien dækker naturlige insekter i kæmpeformat, foruden de fantastiske, bizarre og uvirkelige monsterinsekter samt araknider og dyr i normal og kæmpestørrelse. Insekter er vanskelige at påvirke med sociale effekter, og de har derfor ingen eller meget høje morale-værdier.

boardgame.name: Helligfolks trylleremser
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Helligfolk kan et vist antal trylleremser af forskellig styrke hver dag. Trylleremser er magtfulde besværgelser med mange forskellige effekter. Når en trylleremse aktiveres, vælger spilleren hvilken effekt remsen skal have.

boardgame.name: Karakterskabelse i Hinterlandet
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Du skal bruge et karakterark, notespapir, mindst 3t6 og en pen, samt denne vejledning. Derefter er der fire trin, som du skal gennemgå, og voila! Du har en karakter klar til eventyr.

boardgame.name: Magiske skatte
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Magiske ting kommer i mange former og med mange forskellige effekter. Der er overordnet tre typer magiske ting – de midlertidige, de almindelige og de unikke – og de er opdelt som følger:

boardgame.name: Rejsen gennem Hinterlandet
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Denne tekst handler om den del af spillet, der finder sted, når heltene ikke er nede i hulesystemet. Det dækker rejsen til og fra hulerne, men også når heltene forlader hulerne for at slå lejr og komme igen dagen efter med nye reserver.

boardgame.name: Trolddom for troldfolk
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Denne tekst rummer en gennemgang af, hvorledes trolddom virker for troldfolk, samt en gennemgang af reglerne for tryllebøger, memorisere formularer og lignende, samt en formular-oversigt for de tre troldfolks traditioner samt for elverne. Der findes andre magiske traditioner end de nævnte, f.eks. illusionisternes, men disse er beskrevet i særlige mikro-supplementer.

boardgame.name: Brev fra Noctus
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Der er mange onde spådomme for tiden, og derfor har lederen af Den Ensomme Fæstning, Lucinius, søgt råd hos troldmanden Noctus, som er ekspert i det hemmelighedsfulde Nat-rige.

Da der ikke kommer svar fra Noctus, beslutter Lucinius sig for at sende en gruppe eventyrere ud til troldmandens tårn for at se, om der er sket noget med ham.

Scenariet er et klassisk rollespilsscenarie med krigere, troldmænd og andre eventyrere, der skal på eventyr i troldmandens tårn. Til scenariet bruges regler fra Hinterlandet, der er en lettere, dansk udgave af D&D. Du behøver ikke at kunne reglerne.

boardgame.name: De hjerteløses hammer
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Talrige tegn og varsler på, at stor ulykke truer livet ved Den ensomme fæstning har gjort deres entre: Ved sidste fuldmåne har månen rød og truende på himlen, ingen smørkærnere kunne få deres smør til at stivne den følgende morgen, og en flok af gæs fløj skræppende over teltlejren ved solnedgang, hvilket de kloge koner kan fortælle er et ilde tegn, vejrheksen har jamret over kommende uvejr, og fæstningens biavler klager over, at halvdelen af hans bidronninger pludseligt er døde, mens vaskekonerne fortæller, at vandet i bækken ikke længere vasker rent, og det siges, at da fæstningens kok skulle anrette fisk til kommandanten, fandt han kul i fiskenes indvolde!

Skyerne hænger lavt og gråt over teltlejren og fæstningen, og moralen er i bund. Overalt ser folk tegn på den nært forestående undergang, men heksene ved heksens hule har en løsning på problemet. De skal bare lige bruge nogle modige folk til a hjælpe sig, for ude i ødemarken er kilden til at afværge ulykker og onde skæbner, hvis bare nogen tør drage der til.

boardgame.name: Den gyldne hånd
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

En hånd af guld! En skattejæger har gjort årets fund. Kravlende mere død end levende ud af vildmarken har hun hjembragt en hånd af det pureste guld.

Ved fæstningen løber rygterne hurtigt. Alle vil gerne gøre et lignende fund, og allerhelst vil de gerne finde resten af den statue, som hånden stammer fra. Skattejægeren siger ingenting, men hun har efterladt sig nogle spor, som bliver gransket inderligt. Ifølge rygterne må skattejægeren have fundet skatten ved en af de ruiner, der ligger nogle få dagsrejser fra Færgelejet. Nu gælder det om at komme først.

Den forgyldte hånd handler om Jagten på Den gyldne hånds skat. Ifølge et skattekort af tvivlsomt ophav er hånden af pureste guld blevet fundet ved en af de ruiner i Kæmpens dal, der er aftegnet på kortet – men hvilken og hvem finder den først? Og hvad med den kæmpe, som siges at vogte området og æde mennesker levende?

Hinterlandet på Con2 er for nysgerrige skattejægere, som er villige til at vove liv og lemmer for fantastiske skatte. I år går turen ikke til et bestemt hulesystem, men lader spillerne vove sig gennem vildmarken til forskellige hulesystemer. Hinterlandet er oldschool fantasy rollespil med enkle regler, som er hurtigt lært. Hinterlandet er også en kæmpe rollespilskampagne for både nye og erfarne – overlever din karakter et scenarie, må du bruge karakteren igen i følgende scenarier. Har du en karakter fra tidligere conner, må du også bruge karakteren.

boardgame.name: Den skjulte skov
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Rygterne svirrer - en mand; nej, en elver, siger jeg dig, er blevet fundet og båret op til Den Ensomme Fæstning - stærkt afkræftet og bleg. Han rablede om den sidste ild, om sygdom, om undergang og noget om at få hjælp. Nu er du blevet kaldt til Fæstningen af kommandanten, så du får åbenbart syn for sagen. Beskeden lod forstå, at denne mission havde betydning for hele Kejserriget og måske mere end det.

boardgame.name: Den sorte brud fra Sukkenes Kløft
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Alle ved, at krydse floden Klippeskyl, som fosser klar og kold fra bjergene, er at opgive livet. Ikke kun er strømmen kraftig og klipperne skarpe, men landet på den anden side af floden er forbandet. Ingen vender levende derfra.

Ikke desto mindre er Fru Tbli-Yan af Huset Den grå bjørn stålsat på at hyre opdagelsesrejsende til at krydse floden og finde hendes søn, som forsvandt i området. Hun vil betale rundhåndet for at modige folk bringer hendes søn hjem. De tre første selskaber er allerede draget af sted. Ingen er vendt hjem endnu. Nu er folk begyndt at afvise hendes tilbud og skamfuldt kigge bort, når hun trygler dem om at redde hendes søn.

Den sorte brud fra Sukkenes kløft sender en flok opdagelsesrejsende på en farlig færd i ødemarken til et forbandet land, som ingen mand er vendt tilbage fra.

boardgame.name: FIST
FIST: FREELANCE INFANTRY STRIKE TEAM
boardgame.description:
In the second half of the twentieth century, the great powers compete for military supremacy on the world stage. A team of misfits—dreamers, fighters, and government lab rats who have fallen out of the bottom of society—are reborn as soldiers of fortune navigating a web of intrigue and conspiracy. Perhaps your prime minister has been psychically attacked in his sleep. Perhaps your top scientists have disastrously opened a gate to another dimension. Perhaps your enemies are on the cusp of perfecting robotic superweapons, astral projection, or biological warfare. For the right price, those misfits can help. When you’re all out of options, it’s time to call FIST.


*PARANORMAL MERCENARIES - Use the modular traits system to construct unique and fully-equipped characters in a matter of seconds. Play as a telekinetic alien, a mutant sniper, or a cyborg ninja.
*BRUTAL ACTION - Experience fast, fluid stunts and combat with the tried-and-true 2D6 resolution roll. Play with a hyper-rules-light system that offers intriguing choices and mechanics but never interferes with the action.



TACTICAL OPERATIONS - Plan and execute Cold War espionage missions using the referee guide, or adapt your favorite sci-fi or military OSR content to work with FIST with minimal effort.


FIST is a tabletop roleplaying game for one referee and two to six players. It draws heavily from Chris P. Wolf's Offworlders and John Harper's World of Dungeons, as well as being inspired by Metal Gear Solid, The A-Team, and Doom Patrol.

"The ultimate misfit mashup, you create a ragtag team of fighters who operate on a will-call basis, a sci-fi Suicide Squad of idiots with big guns and psionic powers." - Linda Codega, Tor.com

"I love the graphic design of FIST and I could definitely see myself running it." - Chris P. Wolf, Offworlders

"Yeah, this looks badass." - John Harper, Blades in the Dark

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Fuglene over Kranieklippen
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Vanvid! Det rene vanvid! Det er, hvad der venter jer, hvis I bestiger Kranieklippen!

Den gamle mand med de lasede klæder og det tjavsede hår begyndte at lyde panisk i sit håbløse forsøg på at tale eventyrerne fra deres seneste projekt. I deres øjne lignede han blot en gal tigger. Hvis rygterne talte sandt, skjuler der sig en fantastisk skat på toppen af Kranieklippen – det fængede dem. Hvad rygterne ikke fortalte var, at den gamle mand er hverken tigger eller gammel, men at han har stået over for Vanviddets fugle. På Kranieklippen. Og kun han overlevede.

Fuglene over Kranieklippen lokker eventyrerne på en farlig skattejagt, hvor galskab og begær side om side forsøger at lokke dristige folk på afveje.

boardgame.name: Skyggekongen vender tilbage
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Da pelsjægeren stavrede ind i lejren, var han døden nær efter flere uger i ødemarken. Med sig bragte han en fantastisk historie om en skjult dal, han havde fundet via en sidefloderne i Skoven, og som han kun med nød og næppe havde undsluppet. Han fortalte om templer af guld og diamantminer, hvor man ubesværet kunne skrabe diamanter af væggene, og han fortalte, han havde et kort over ruten til dalen. Han kom sig aldrig af sine sår og strabadser for to dage senere blev han fundet død med en kniv i ryggen. Derefter var der ingen der affærdigede hans historie, som det pure opspind. I stedet begyndte folk febrilsk at studere pelsjægerens historie og færd for at finde den mindste ledetråd, der kan føre dem til dalen.

Skyggekongen vender tilbage er et eventyr om skattejægere, der finder langt mere, end de havde håbet på.

boardgame.name: Det døde bjerg
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Handelsmændene hvisker frygtsomt om det, gennemrejsende hinterlændinge nikker resigneret og selv pelsjægere og urtesamlere passer på, når de er ude i ødemarken. Der er en flyvende rædsel løs, og det siges, at den kan flyve afsted med en hel okse.

For at gøre ondt værre, er den sidst set ude i området ved det døde bjerg - et goldt og ørkesløst sted, hvis rygte er mørkt og slet. Kommandanten har besluttet sig for at udlove en dusør forat stoppe denne trussel, og derfor søger han eventyrere, der er villige til at drage til det døde bjerg.

boardgame.name: Dværgebryggeriet
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Oppe langs floden, der udgår fra Færgelejet, ligger der en biflod, som de lokale Hinterlændinge kalder Gungun. Det er ikke nogen bemærkelsesværdig biflod i sig selv, men den går forbi et forbjerg, hvor røgen konstant står op fra toppen. Her er der for nylig opstået røre, fordi en tønde med en exceptionel god øl, der kom sejlende ned af floden, menes at stamme derfra. En gruppe eventyrere er allerede draget afsted for at undersøge det, men man har intet hørt fra dem efterfølgende. Nu er adskillige af Færgelejets vigtige (om end ikke altid respektable) personager villige til at give guld i hånd på de, der tør drage til Det Rygende Bjerg.

boardgame.name: Flugten fra vinteren
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Fra en fortryllet vinter kommer pludselige snestorme og voldsomt frost midt på sommeren, og det har bragt orkerne på krigsstien. Anført af en grusom krigsherre er de ved at samle sig. Kan en gruppe modige helte standse krigsherren, inden orkerne begynder at marchere?

I Hinterlandet er I eventyrere og lykkeriddere, der drager ind i dybe skove og dunkle grotter for at udforske dem, konfrontere monstre, undgå fælder og erobre skatte, mens I forsøger at standse den fortryllede vinter fra at ødelægge landet. I har hver jeres karakter, og med held, snilde og heldige terningkast, kan I slippe levende gennem hulerne.

Hinterlandet er oldschool fantasyrollespil inspireret af Dungeons & Dragons. Det er både for nybegyndere og for erfarne. Hinterlandet spilles på flere conner og af flere omgange. Overlever din karakter, eller har du en karakter fra tidligere år eller andre conner, må du bruge den igen.

boardgame.name: Snestorm på midsommerdag
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Pludselige snestorme rammer skoven midt på en varm sommerdag. Vil den pludselige frost og kulde lægge landet i ruin? Der er brug for raske helte til at drage ind i skoven og lokke hemmeligheden om den pludselige vinter ud af elverfyrsten.

I Hinterlandet er I eventyrere og lykkeriddere, der drager ned ind dybe skove og dunkle grotter i huler for at udforske dem, konfrontere monstre, undgå fælder og erobre skatte, mens I forsøger at redde verden fra fortryllet vinter. I har hver jeres karakter, og med held, snilde og heldige terningkast, kan I slippe levende gennem udfordringerne.

Hinterlandet er oldschool fantasyrollespil inspireret af Dungeons & Dragons. Det er både for nybegyndere og for erfarne. Hinterlandet spilles på flere conner og af flere omgange. Overlever din karakter, eller har du en karakter fra tidligere år eller andre conner, må du bruge den igen.

boardgame.name: Vinter over sommerlandet
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Den grusomme isheks har ladet sin fortryllede vinter ramme landethårdt midt på sommeren. Der er desperat brug for modige folk, der tør trænge gennem frost og kulde til vinterens hjerte for at redde landet. Er I de folk?

I Hinterlandet er I eventyrere og lykkeriddere, der drager ind i dybe skove og dunkle grotter for at udforske dem, konfrontere monstre, undgå fælder og erobre skatte, mens I forsøger at standse den fortryllede vinter fra at ødelægge landet. I har hver jeres karakter, og med held, snilde og heldige terningkast, kan I slippe levende gennem hulerne.

Hinterlandet er oldschool fantasyrollespil inspireret af Dungeons & Dragons. Det er både for nybegyndere og for erfarne. Hinterlandet spilles på flere conner og af flere omgange. Overlever din karakter, eller har du en karakter fra tidligere år eller andre conner, må du bruge den igen.

boardgame.name: I den dybe, grumme skov
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Den grusomme isheks har ladet sin fortryllede vinter ramme landethårdt midt på sommeren. Der er desperat brug for modige folk, der tør trænge gennem frost og kulde til vinterens hjerte for at redde landet. Er I de folk?

I Hinterlandet er I eventyrere og lykkeriddere, der drager ind i dybe skove og dunkle grotter for at udforske dem, konfrontere monstre, undgå fælder og erobre skatte, mens I forsøger at standse den fortryllede vinter fra at ødelægge landet. I har hver jeres karakter, og med held, snilde og heldige terningkast, kan I slippe levende gennem hulerne.

Hinterlandet er oldschool fantasyrollespil inspireret af Dungeons & Dragons. Det er både for nybegyndere og for erfarne. Hinterlandet spilles på flere conner og af flere omgange. Overlever din karakter, eller har du en karakter fra tidligere år eller andre conner, må du bruge den igen.

boardgame.name: The Mouse In The Iron Mask
boardgame.description:
From the description:

The Mouse In The Iron Mask is a scenario idea for use with Mausritter, Saword and whiskers roleplaying. Our brave adveturering mice have the opportunity to right a wrong, overthrow a despot, and liberate a kingdom from the shackles of tyranny!

boardgame.name: The Mirum
boardgame.description:
From the description:

This is a small zine for Mausritter that adds an exotic hunter faction, 5 foreign creatures, a fire spell, and the burned condition.

boardgame.name: Alkymistens grav
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Et hulesystem gennemsyret af alkymistisk magi, der skulle bevare både dets beboer, en magtfuld alkymist, og hans grav for alle tider. Nu er stedet forfaldet, men magi påvirker stadig stedet, og i alle sprækkerne er væsner og monstre flyttet ind.

User summary:

The scenario consists of a 13-page scenario (US Letter) and a 9-page "Appendix" (A4).

boardgame.name: The Church of Katharszisz
boardgame.description: The Church of Katharszisz is a module for the Mörk Borg RPG.

boardgame.name: Unholy Mountain
boardgame.description: A side-scrolling spelunk for Mörk Borg.

boardgame.name: Heksen i Marmorgraven
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

En nat dukkede hun op i din drøm. Det krogede, hæslige væsen med den spidse næse, en ægte heks, kom krybende ind i din drøm. Kun fordi hanen galede uden for kroen, at du vågnede og undslap hende. En uge senere kom hun igen krybende ind i din drøm mumlende skumle ord, og du vidste instinktivt, at hvis du hørte dem, ville du blive ramt af hendes dødsforbandelse.

Så fandt du ud af, at du ikke er alene. Andre bliver også forfulgt af heksen i deres drømme, og hvis hund indhenter dem, visner de bort, rådnende, mens de endnu er i live. Med et ønske om at undslippe heksens forbandelse, er I søgt mod Marmorgraven, som ligger dybt inde i skoven, for her er orakler og vise folk, der kender hekses hemmeligheder. Kan I nå dertil, inden tiden rinder ud?

Heksen i Marmorgraven er et fantasy-eventyr med vægt på udforskning og eventyr for både veteraner og nybegyndere.

boardgame.name: Heksen i Dødemandsmosen
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Høsten er ved at slå fejl for bønderne i Carmaga. Det skyldes en forbandelse. Brave helte søges! Folk, som tør vove sig ind i Dødemandsmosen og sætte en stopper for heksen og hendes ugerninger. Hvem skal dog redde de stakkels bønder?

Sådan lyder snakken rundt om bordet i skænkestuen, da I lader jer besnakke til at gå ned i mosen. Hvor farlig kan en sådan heks være?

Heksen i Dødemandsmosen er et fantasy-eventyr, hvor en flok overmodige helte vover sig ind i mosen. Her venter mange sære beboere, og heltene kommer i deres søgen efter heksen til at stå over for mange sære væsner.

boardgame.name: FINGERS: Freelance Infantry's Nascent Guarantee for the Eradication of Revenant Subjects
boardgame.description:
In the second half of the twentieth century, while the great powers compete for military supremacy on the world stage, a team of misfit mercenaries has been forced by circumstance to turn its sights on a growing plague of resurrections. perhaps an isolated town has fallen under the influence of a death cult. perhaps a reclusive billionaire has learned a grisly exploit for immortality. perhaps something that was never alive has awoken under the arctic ice, hungry to propagate and spread. for the right price, those misfits can help.

when the dead won't stay dead, it’s time to call…

FINGERS
Freelance Infantry's Nascent Guarantee for the Eradication of Revenant Subjects


FINGERS is a pack of six missions for use with b. everett dutton's paranormal espionage action rpg, FIST.

They are focused on themes of paralife and undeath.


Content Warning for occult violence, death, captivity, cannibalism, parasitism, needles, all primarily in a pulp thriller context.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: GRASP: Generally Recognized Assets for Strategic Purposes
boardgame.description:
in the second half of the twentieth century, while the great powers compete for military supremacy on the world stage, a team of misfit mercenaries has been backed into a corner by their enemies. low on funding, and with few allies remaining, their only hope is to call on forces they had hoped never to use.

when the regular loadout of military tech and occult savvy isn't enough, it’s time to activate…

GRASP
Generally Recognized Assets for Strategic Purposes


GRASP is a pack of new Traits, new Roles, vehicles rules, and new modes of play for use with b. everett dutton's paranormal espionage action rpg, FIST.

Using this supplement, mercenaries can be haunted by the ghost of Marcus Gavius Apicus, splice themselves with ancient hog DNA, and sic the Hound Of Tindalos on their enemies.


Content Warning for violence, death, and the occult, all in a pulp action context.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: REACH: Recon Encounter Archives of Complex Hostiles
boardgame.description:
in the second half of the twentieth century, while the great powers compete for military supremacy on the world stage, a team of misfit mercenaries has begun to chart the edges of seven sprawling conspiracies. as the mercenaries' awareness of the capabilities of these organizations grows, so too do the stakes for their missions.

and when a chance raid on a CYCLOPS server facility unearths a trove of buried intel, FIST will gain access to…

REACH
Recon Encounter Archives of Complex Hostiles


REACH is a pack of seven factions (plus faction-specific monsters) for use with b. everett dutton's paranormal espionage action rpg, FIST.


Content Warning for violence, death, the occult, and parasitism all primarily in a pulp thriller context.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: plot ARMOR
boardgame.description:
In stories, the hero can't die until the story is over. If the PROTAGONIST realized this, in any capacity, what would they do?

Catalog the journey of PROTAGONIST over a *32-episode mecha anime season as they fight through the world of your creation in the cockpit of their ARMOR. As you skip through episodes, it's your duty to be the voice of PROTAGONIST. Journal about what's been happening to you, what's been happening to your ARMOR, and about this unbelievable life of impossibilities.

Live until you die.


Dev Note: Optimal play is a 24 episode season rather than 32.


Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Hero Too!
boardgame.description:
Superhero stories are often so painfully cis. Isn’t it time we changed that up?

Hero Too! Is a teen superhero story for trans people. It is a single player journaling game where you will use prompts and advice to guide your character through their supeheroic school as they deal with issues both related to their trans identity and due to just being a supehero.

The world can be hard for trans people. Lucky for us, we’re so much more badass than it.

This game is a hack of plot ARMOR by Orion Black

Content Warning: This game deals with issues such as dysphoria, transphobia (Both societal and personal) and other potentially triggering parts of the trans experience. Please put your own comfort first before playing this game. And always play with safety.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: The NASCAR Racing Game
boardgame.description:
The NASCAR Racing Game is a simple racing game. Cars are moved according to the roll of two standard dice. Landing on a green or yellow flag space requires drawing one of the matching cards. Pit cards must be drawn every five laps.

The rulebook includes 16 pages of NASCAR trivia, but this is not used in the game.

boardgame.name: Get Your Game On!
boardgame.description:
This is a world where card games matter. It’s a world where they decide who’s famous, who is wealthy and who gets the glory. It’s a world where a cardshop is the hottest thing in every city. And most importantly to you, it’s a world where you can enroll in a school that teaches you all about card games.

Step back into a time when that shiny new card you got in a packet meant the world to you. Because it literally does mean the world here.

Get Your Game On is a GM-less ttrpg based on the Firebrands Framework by D. Vincent Baker and Meguey Baker. It is heavily inspired and takes cues from Yugioh GX and Cardfight Vanguard.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Badeanstalten
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Langt ude i de sumpede egne af ødemarken ligger en gammel badeanstalt, der stadig bærer minderne fra sin storhedstid i en længst svunden tidsalder, og så bærer badeanstalten på en besynderlig magisk hemmelighed, som sætter mærkelige væsener i verden, og hvis heltene ikke er varsomme, ender de som disse.

boardgame.name: Bastardkongens bule
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Inde i en bjergkæde, hvor bjergene er bundet sammen af en ældgammel akvædukt, der i mere end 1000 år har bragt vand til de tørre egne i Hinterlandet, ligger der skjult huler og miner bygget af akvæduktens bygherrer. For nyligt overtog den udstødte bastardkonge, en gambler, nogle af disse glemte huler og indrettede et nyt sted for hazardspil.

boardgame.name: Den forladte sal
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

En forladt høj, som en gang var dværgenes kongssal. Overalt ligger faldne krigere, men hvem var deres banemand?

boardgame.name: Den hemmelige have
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

On the edge of the Empire lies a wasteland called the Hinterland. At first, the land was thought to be empty and uninhabited, but expedition after expedition of adventurers has revealed that the Hinterland hides the ruins of an ancient civilization that has disappeared from the history books. Join an expedition out into the Hinterland to the forgotten ruins.

User summary:

This scenario was revised and re-worked as Kampen om undergrunden.

boardgame.name: Kampen om undergrunden
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

On the edge of the Empire lies a wasteland called the Hinterland. At first, the land was thought to be empty and uninhabited, but expedition after expedition of adventurers has revealed that the Hinterland hides the ruins of an ancient civilization that has disappeared from the history books. Join an expedition out into the Hinterland to the forgotten ruins.

User summary:

This is a re-worked and revised version of Den hemmelige have.

boardgame.name: Orchards: The Card Game
boardgame.description:
Orchards is a strategic card game in which players will plant, grow, harvest and sell fruit in order to fulfil orders from the market. Each order fulfilled earns the player victory points. At the end of the game the player with the most points wins.

Plant the domino-shaped cards in a grid to form the orchard. Grow by adding cards to your hand matching the cards adjacent to the one planted. Harvest fruit by enclosing a card of that type within the orchard. Sell harvested fruit at the market to earn victory points and win the game.

—description from the publisher

listing.notes: Title: Orchards: The Card Game Publisher: Flying Carpet Games Language(s): English German

boardgame.name: Den lysende brønd
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Et besynderligt hulesystem ude i Hinterlandets marskegne, hvor der venter eventyrerne udfordringer af en karakter, de ikke har oplevet før. Noget faldt ned fra himlen og ligger nu gemt under jorden, og frøfolket har overtaget stedet.

boardgame.name: Det oversvømmede tempel
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Sejler man langs floden med de høje skrænter kommer man forbi en stille sidegren, og i bunden af den ligger et tempel fra en glemt tidsalder. Ikke desto mindre skjuler stedet en skat, som trækker Dragekultens tilbedere til, men stedet er hjemsøgt af døende, og af vogterne fra Dødsriget.

boardgame.name: Kraken Up
boardgame.description:
It's the Krakens' turn to fish for humans! Players will grow their Kraken's tentacles and reel in bounty to form scoring combinations.

Draft and play one card each turn before passing the hand of cards to the next player. The selected card can be used as food to grow your tentacle, or added to the ocean as bounty to (hopefully) be collected later. The most enterprising Krakens may even wrap their tentacles around a cruise ship full of tasty travellers!

—description from the publisher

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Dragedræberens grav
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Afbrændte marker, plyndrede karavaner, forbandet guld og mareridt om et enormt monster, der æder folk levende i en mundfuld. For de gamle folk er tegnene klare: En drage er vågnet af sin søvn.

Ude i ødemarken rører en gammel ondskab på sig. Dens kald trækker sære folk med onde blikke og stammer af fanatiske kobolder til sig. En drage er vendt tilbage, og hære af onde væsener er ved at samle sig under dens grådige blik. Dragens ondskab kan mærkes milevidt omkring: guld er blevet forbandet, og slagsmål bryder ofte ud på markedspladsen mellem købmænd og handlende, når ingen vil slippe guldet. Folk klager over mareridt, hvor en skikkelse iført en gylden dragemaske kalder dem til sig, og kommandant Lucinius har brug for helte mere end nogensinde før. Er du en af de helte? Tør du konfrontere dragen?

boardgame.name: Byen, der sank
Dragen vågner - Byen, der sank
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

De skingre skrig fra flokke af kobolder ekkoer mellem dalens bjerge, og lyden af dem behager Dragen, der slumrer i rede. Drevet af vanvid og angst tilbeder kobolderne Dragen, og de samles hver nat ved en gammel stenbygning, som deres shaman har erklæret befinder sig nær himlen og jorden. Hvilke mystiske kræfter er det kobolderne flokkes om, og kan de bruges i kampen mod Dragen? Modige helte til at udforske dette mysterium søges.

boardgame.name: Den kidnappede kejserlige ingeniør, or, Hvad orkerne holder hemmeligt
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

De skingre skrig fra flokke af kobolder ekkoer mellem dalens bjerge, og lyden af dem behager Dragen, der slumrer i rede. Drevet af vanvid og angst tilbeder kobolderne Dragen, og de samles hver nat ved en gammel stenbygning, som deres shaman har erklæret befinder sig nær himlen og jorden. Hvilke mystiske kræfter er det kobolderne flokkes om, og kan de bruges i kampen mod Dragen? Modige helte til at udforske dette mysterium søges.

boardgame.name: Dragens rede
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Dybt inde i bjergene, hvor svovldampende hænger tungt i luften, gjalder fanatiske kobolders skrig. Følger man grotteåbningen afslører sig en underjordisk verden hengivet tilbedelsen af Dragen, der ligger dybest inde slumrende sin farlige søvn.

boardgame.name: Dødekongens katakombe
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Det endelige hulesystem i alt sin forfærdelige vælde, og hjemsted for Herren, den grusomme mester, der langsomt er ved at samle ondskaben omkring sig og således manifestere sig. Stadig er ondskaben ved at manifestere sig, men slår driftige helte til, kan de standse de mørke kræfter fra at samle sig. Dødekongens katakombe er en solid udfordring for heltene og afslutningen på kampagnen om Dødekongen.

boardgame.name: Dødekongens løjtnant
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Et hulesystem, der peger på den trussel, som truer. En ork har kæmpet sig vej om gennem de onde monstres hierarki og er begyndt at dyrke sin onde herre som en af de udødelige.

boardgame.name: Dødningenes gravkammer
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

En ung general fra en fjern fortid ligger begravet her sammen med sin elskede, men udøde tjenere plejer hans grav og holder ham fanget i en udød tilstand, hvor han ikke kan finde sammen med sin elskede i dødsriget.

boardgame.name: Døden i alkymistens grav
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Den gamle gravhøj, som alle troede var forladt og øde, er begyndt at udsende en mystisk, sort og fed røg, og rejsende beretter, at de har set bander af orker strejfe omkring i området. Jægere fortæller, at vildtet i området ved de gamle gravhøje er forsvundet, og folk, som overnatter i området har mareridt om et summende insekt-ansigt monster, der prøver at trænge ind i deres hoveder. Der er brug for helte til at udforske den gamle gravhøj og finde ud af, hvad det er, som huserer i højen - og hvem er modige nok til at konfrontere og standse det?

boardgame.name: Elverfyrstens grav
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Dybt inde i de skovrige egne af Hinterlandet ligger en smaragdgrøn grotte, hvor en ældgammel heks er ved at vågne efter tusind års søvn. Kan modige eventyrere og helte standse heksen fra at vågne og samle hære af trolde og kæmper til at knuse menneskenes lande?

User summary:

The scenario is distributed as three PDF files:


87-page scenario
6-page "variable material" (optional modifications)
1-page keyed map

boardgame.name: Geoiden
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Kommandant Lucinius har indkaldt jer til en vigtig mission. Kommandanten beretter, at han tidligere har sendt en gruppe ud for at finde og sikre en rute ud til en krystalgrotte, da handelen omkring fæstningen med magiske artefakter og tilbehør er stadigt stigende, og det er behovet også. Om den første mission beretter kommandanten, at af de fire vendte kun en tilbage.

boardgame.name: Glemslens palads
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Glemslens palads er et eventyr med hallucinationer, galninge og en kødædende plante. På en kunstig høj omgivet af resterne af en voldgrav ligger ruinen af et palads.

boardgame.name: Oraklet i Marmorgraven
boardgame.description:
Author's blurb:

Dybt inde i skoven ligger Marmorgraven. Hjemsted for viise folk og orakler, men vejen dertil er farlig, og oraklerne er kryptiske. General Visenius står over for at føre Kejserrigets hære ind i et af de største slag i mands minde, og han har desperat brug for at kende fremtiden. For at fjendtlige spioner ikke skal sabotere hans planer sendes et eventyrere og lykkeriddere på en hemmelig mission til Marmorgravens orakler. Anført af vismanden Patmos begynder en farefuld færd ud i vildmarken.

I rollerne, som de eventyrere, der skal bringe et afgørende orakel for dagen, sendes I på en færd til Marmorgraven, hvor talrige farer lurer.

Oraklet i Marmorgraven er et fantasy-eventyr med vægt på udforskning og eventyr for både veteraner og nybegyndere.

boardgame.name: Rollin Checkers
boardgame.description: The board is a regular checkers board with indentations for balls to roll into place. At the beginning of the game the balls are placed on the board and the board is moved until all the balls are set in place. Any ball that rolled to the king row is replaced with a larger ball to represent a king and has all the powers of a king in regular checkers. Play then continues with regular checkers rules.

boardgame.name: What Lurks Beneath Antarctica?
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

It was meant to be a simple taxi job, flying your fiancé's brother to the outpost where she works in Antarctica while also making use of the visit to catch up with her after several months of being on separate assignments. Unfortunately, upon arriving at Espial Outpost, the site of deep excavation and a scientific laboratory studying a unique breed of fungus growing under the surface of the icy continent, things inevitably GO SOUTH!

This book contains an interactive short story where the reader makes the decisions for the main character. It is written in straightforward prose for older teens and adults who struggle with reading and places the reader straight into the action where their choices determine who lives and who dies. This volume is designed to be as portable as possible; an alternative to having a phone stuck to your face while travelling or sitting quietly at home. It doesn't require any dice, pencils or erasers to play; you only need the book.

boardgame.name: A Dog's Breakfast in Jack's Wood
boardgame.description:
December 1944. World War II rages on as the American 101st Airborne dig themselves in to defend Jack's Wood near the Belgian village of Foy. They must repel any German advance until support arrives from their armoured divisions who have been delayed by bad weather. Also located nearby is a small medical camp where a squad of Australian engineers formulates a foolhardy plan. Can they execute their mission successfully, or will it all GO SOUTH!?

This book contains an interactive short story where the reader makes the decisions for the main character. It is written in straightforward prose for older teens and adults who struggle with reading and places the reader straight into the action where their choices determine who lives and who dies. This volume is designed to be as portable as possible; an alternative to having a phone stuck to your face while travelling or sitting quietly at home. It doesn't require any dice, pencils or erasers to play; you only need the book.

boardgame.name: CryptidCurrency
boardgame.description:
From the description:

An adventure seed for Agents of the ODD (or Delta Green and the like, probably).

Rescue innocent cryptids from crypto miners!

boardgame.name: Stone Assassins
boardgame.description:
From the description:

Animated stone statues that make the perfect assassins.

boardgame.name: What Can Be Recovered from the Dead Horse?
boardgame.description:
From the description:

A set of tables for scavenging the corpses of dead horses in MÖRK BORG.

boardgame.name: F.1 Grand Prix, circuit de Spa-Francorchamps
boardgame.description:
F.1 Grand Prix is a game for 2-5 players. It is a true competition of Formula 1 miniatures on the Belgian automobile circuit from Spa-Francorchamps, one of the most beautiful automobile circuit in the world, by his trace and his landscape, that of the Belgian Ardennes.

For to start, each player selects his car and his stand A B C D or E. Each car is placed in the car park stand, and now the game starts by the qualification, in order to know what pilot will occupy the after the trails.

Then the players start to race by drawing cards from a deck to determine how far the race around the track. Some cards force you to draw a card from a second deck which could be an advantage or dis-advantage for your car.

The first player who achieves 5 circuit turns and who goes over the check pattern flag is winner. The others continue to play to know their arrival order.
One suggestion! You can thus make championships in 3, 4 or 5 sleeves attributing for each competition, 9 points for first, 7 points for second, 5 points for third, 3 points for fourth and 1 point for the fifth. You determine thus the Champion of the Champions.

boardgame.name: Cyber Odyssey
boardgame.description:
Cyber Odyssey is an openworld cyberpunk board game with investigation at its core.

Play as the head of a Faction, recruit agents and send them all over the 5 Districts of New Eden to discover what goes wrong in this city...

Turn after turn, during a definite number of day, player will choose between great amount of actions in order to gather clue, or advantages. They can even fight for them on separate tactical boards.

If a player manages to gather all the clues before everyone, they get to win. Otherwise, each player will add up their clue points which will give the final score.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Cyber Odyssey: Alone Against the Machine
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Players: Games with expansions that add solo play

boardgame.name: Anti-Enzyme
آنتی آنزیم (Anti-Enzyme)
boardgame.description:
Have you ever asked yourself why the washed clothes in the washing machine still have stains?
Maybe the detergent is not good enough, or the washing machine doesn't work perfectly.
However, in this game, you would face a completely different story!
You would encounter the stains which are alive and try to live. The stains are trying to increase by moving from one cloth to another. They have to compete with each other while trying to fight the washing machine and its washing order. In this story, each time the washing machine starts to rotate, the stains also create a competition to make a higher impact on the clothes. However, sometimes the washing machine and its detergent succeeds and can stop the stains.
you play as a stain and your aim is to try to occupy more space in the washing machine and heavily penetrate into the clothes.
In this game there are a series of rounds that is played in two phases:

Players phase (Stains Phase)# Washing machine phase


in phase one players can do one of these actions:

importing a stain on clothes
moving existing stains on clothes
play an Enzyme card


and in phase two, one of the players roll the dice as the washing machine.

Besides competing with each other, each player should resist the washing machine and its tendency to clean the clothes. At the end of the game, each player who has more stains on clothes will win the game.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Sword Breaker (Issue No. 8 - Carapace and Claw)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

This issue of the Sword Breaker zine lays out a fantasy setting in which the shaping of living things to be used as tools and resources has taken over every aspect of the culture.

What will you do in Carapace and Claw?

● Don living armor to repel the claw-swords and sting-spears of your enemies!
● Play the z’murka or sing the songs of the fire ant queen to inspire or dissuade!
● Harvest the flesh-friend maggots or summon a lichen bridge!
● Protect the tortured denizens of the sporewild from the back of your loyal war beetle!
● Trick a shimmering gossamer door into revealing a mountain of luck-grubs!
● Hum the secret tones of the shadowrot to break the rules of reality!
● Put on your iron helm and burn the ungodly witch-world to the ground!

boardgame.name: Kasserine Pass
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

No word has been received from an outpost on the trade road and a group has been sent out with matching results. Now, the party has been hired to move into a canyon where the outpost is at to investigate. Being seasoned adventurers, you're certain you can handle whatever lies in the desert!

The scenario was designed for a quartet of fourth level PCs. This offering was a fantastic time for the Murder Hobo Inc. podcast show on Twitch. The series features a rotating cast for a two hour game every week.

boardgame.name: Locked Adventures: Ein Weihnachtsfall
boardgame.description: Your team accepted the invitation of a renowned journalism school to Berlin, where a student turned to you for help: Her friend Christopher suddenly went into hiding because he had got wind of a suspicious matter. Christopher was in the utmost panic and said that it was a matter of life and death, but the police must not be called on under any circumstances! Your investigative talent is more in demand than ever in the new city. You make your way through unknown Berlin to help Christopher. Are you late or can you still provide last-minute help?

boardgame.name: Motor City
boardgame.description:
Motor City is a strategic roll-and-write game about running an auto plant in the heydey of Detroit.

In Motor City, you have two player sheets, each with multiple areas. These areas are represented by tracks that you will mark off as you make progress. Many of the tracks are interconnected with other elements in the game, giving you bonuses along the way and opportunities to unlock more points. Advancing on all of these tracks offers various amounts of points, advancements, and bonuses.

The game lasts eight rounds. Each round, roll colored dice based on the number of players, then place them on spaces on the blueprint table based on value and color. Each player drafts one die and uses it. Once everyone has drafted a die twice, all players get to use the remaining die on the blueprint table.

After eight rounds, you score points for your progress in engineering, assembly, testing, and more. Whoever has the most points wins.

Motor City has a solo mode in which you try to top your own score against an auditor that drafts dice and blocks areas of your sheet. Its difficulty can easily be adjusted by changing the colors of dice during setup, with no added rules.

Motor City is game 3 of the Motor City Gameworks Loaded Roll and Write series.

Game 1: Fleet: The Dice Game
Game 2: Three Sisters
Game 3: Motor City

–description from the designer
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 178: Special Guests - Ben Pinchback & Adam Hill from Motor City Gameworks

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: NOD (Issue 36 - Mar 2021)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Welcome to Yore!

This first issue of NOD for 2021 visits a land of halflings torn by civil war, introduces you to the halfling saints, and brings you Table Top Soccer.
boardgame.rpg: Blood & Treasure Fantasy Role Playing Game

boardgame.name: A Dozen Auspicious Rumors
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Rumors that require the player characters to actively participate in the nearby interaction between NPCs may lead to dangerous – possibly rewarding – adventure. The rumors detailed within the pages of this latest entry in the A Dozen . . . series of PDFs are ready when you are!

As always, the contents of this PDF were created for use with any fantasy roleplaying game. It is the gamemaster, more than this work, that breathes life into the campaign and what follows exists only to inspire the gamemaster and drive encounters to fill the gaps in the larger story.

boardgame.name: A Dozen Loathsome Rumors
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

When the player characters settle in at the nearest tavern, they expect to gather information and leads that may direct them to adventure (and treasures!). Although you could create every scrap of chatter that the PCs may overhear at the local tavern, your life as a GM will be much easier if you have a little help.

Each of the following rumors was written to inspire you and to drive your own creativity. As with all of my works, these will be most valuable if you make them your own. What I may find suitable for a fantasy campaign world may be wrong for your setting. Only you can adapt and modify my ideas and warp them to fit your needs.

Again, as with the earlier releases in this series, everything that follows is completely systemless. Where “rules” have been included, they are as generic as I could manage and serve one purpose only: to offer some minimal guidance that – I hope – aids you when it comes time to apply the rules of your chosen game to the concepts.

boardgame.name: Instant Numbers
boardgame.description: Instant Numbers initiates an arithmetic contest in which players race against a 60 seconds timer to score as many points as possible by tackling simple arithmetic.

boardgame.name: Dirty Rattenkrieg
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Soviet Union is in dire straits. The German war machine has advanced all the way to Stalingrad where Joseph Stalin has vowed that his soldiers will take not one step back! You must help the Soviet propaganda machine rally the Russian troops. Glory for Mother Russia! There is no land beyond the Volga!

Dirty Rattenkrieg is a short WWII: Operation WhiteBox mission designed for 3-6 characters of 1st-3rd level. The mission involves a propaganda excursion in the ruined city of Stalingrad. There is some opportunity for roleplaying, but characters like the Grunt, Sniper, Tactician, and even the Überläufer would be best suited for this mission.

This mission was playtested at Virtual Gary Con 2020. Special thanks to Michael Bolam, Andrew Johnson, Eric Seitz, and Derek Watts for their enthusiasm and input during and after the game!

Dirty Rattenkrieg is the perfect way to kick off an Eastern Front campaign. Check it out now, Comrades!

boardgame.name: Praise His Name
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The tiny town of Woodbury, a mere flyspeck place in the Empire’s dingy backwaters, has a new god and not the same one as followed by people most other places. Thanks to a scoundrel’s scheme to enrich himself at the expense of the gullible folk, a dreadful entity has grown from a nebulous idea into a monstrous thing that watches over all and everyone for any sign of error, any sign of misdeed. Now, Woodbury’s people have become prisoners of their faith and the more they fear, the more they pray, the greater their god becomes.

Praise His Name wraps words around a stunning piece of art by André Meister. Like I did with artists for the other offerings in the Unspeakable Things series, I asked Meister to come up with something on his own, and, after a few sketches and ideas, we settled on this big, bold monstrosity. I might have done a gigantic, scary monster, but I felt that a tweak on the line would be welcome. Given the nature of the game’s cosmology, I wondered what would happen if a devout community went off the deep end. And here, dear reader, is the result of my musings.

boardgame.name: Instant Letters
boardgame.description:
Players engage in an anagramming contest while racing a 60 seconds timer to score as many points as possible .
Points are allocated based on quality of words formed, and player with highest points after pre-agreed number of rounds wins.

boardgame.name: Porradaria card game
boardgame.description: Inspired by the arcade games of the 1980's/1990's, Porradaria features characters with special abilities that battle against each other using weapon, battlefield, "punch" as well special cards and the final goal of the game is the elimination of the other characters. This is a 2 (two) deck card game, with 5 (five) characters in each deck, which can be played by 2 to 5 players with 1 deck, or up to 10 players with 2 decks.

boardgame.name: Instant Rhymes
boardgame.description:
In Instant rhymes, players engage in a contest of calling words with correct suffix

At the start of a round, a games master (or player acting as one) calls the active suffix and the first player to call a correct word with that suffix gets the card.
Play continues till pre-agreed number of cards are exhausted.
Player with the most cards at the end of the round wins the game.

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Replantica
boardgame.description:
A casual family game of spatial strategy, tree planting and animal rescue for all ages above 6.

In Replantica, you restore lost forest and rescue displaced animals. Players start by planting saplings, then water them to grow large trees. Special planting configurations on the playmat yield various bonuses for the players. Throughout the game, players must populate the new forest with animals and can win through a combination of clever strategy and lucky dice. The goal of the game is to be the first player to plant all your large trees and rehome all your rescued animals, one of which should be in your home habitat.

Replantica is produced entirely of natural materials (glass pebbles, wooden dice, canvas playmat, cotton drawstring bag for storage, cardboard and paper).

Every box of Replantica that is sold includes a donation to plant 10 real trees through reforestation charities.

—description from the publications

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Abyssal Abominations
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Monster Roster is a complete and highly detailed manual of 15 unique and interesting monsters for your Dungeon World games.

Each creature featured in Monster Roster is built on the real life myths and lore surrounding the deepest parts of the ocean, as told from nearly every corner of the globe. Creatures from biblical myth, Hawaii, Maori and Cameroonian tales, Scottish legends and more are present, along with several monsterized versions of real life deep sea horrors. As a bonus and first for the Monster Roster series, this volume contains a Build Your Own Kaiju section for extra help creating huge titans on the fly.

Monster Roster IV: Abyssal Abominations is a robust showcase of tremendous and powerful encounters to liven up your play sessions and provide a rich cast of possible antagonists to surprise and challenge your players. These encounters vary greatly in difficulty, scope of power, temperament, goals, and abilities, giving GMs fun and exiting new ways to get those narrative hooks that leave PCs recounting their RPG war stories forever.

boardgame.name: Instant Songs
boardgame.description:
Players engage in a singing contest by recalling relevant songs word-lyrics fastest.

On a turn, a games master (or player acting as one) calls a word and fastest player to sing a song gets the card.

Play continues till number of pre-agreed cards is exhausted or reached by a player.

Player with most cards at the end of the game wins.

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Give Us Victories
boardgame.description:
"GIVE US VICTORIES" is a wargame about the Chancellorsville campaign, fought during the American Civil War, when 130,000 soldiers of the Union Northern Army clashed with the much smaller Northern Virginia Army, led by General Robert E. Lee.

General Joseph Hooker, newly appointed by President Lincoln, was in command of the Army of the Potomac. Lincoln’s engagement letter ended with the words "Give Us Victories”.

The game begins on April 30, 1863, with the Army of the Potomac now beyond the Rappahannock and Rapidan, marching toward Chancellorsville. The game is of intermediate complexity and has simple and intuitive rules. The command system is the heart of the game: you simply check how many points you have in a turn, choose the formations to activate (divisions for the Confederates and corps for the Union), and put them in a cup. Your opponent does the same; then mix and pull…! Formations may move, attack, entrench, bombard and so on. Special rules cover the use of skirmishers, trench building, and bridge building. Players perform actions alternately with a random activation system always engaging and different, creating chaos and uncertainty, in a realistic and tense simulation.

Four games included

Main game - 2 standard maps, 2 counter sets (figure and Nato style, so players can choose), medium difficulty, 6-8 hours for the campaign, 4 scenarios, 2 variations.
Strategic game - 1 A3 map, 1 counters set, 1 hour of gameplay, low difficulty.
Solo game - AI simulates Army of the Potomac, 1 counters set; uses the same maps of the main game.
Skirmish game - set of paper toy soldiers, landscape elements and counters; low difficulty, playing time 30 minutes.


In the box:

2 standard maps (86x54 cm)
1 A3 map (strategic game)
1 12x10 (cm) map (variant for main game)
4 counters set, 17 mm side
Set up charts
Rules aid, tables, solo game display, solo game booklet
Paper soldiers (cardboard)
Rules booklet (Main game, scenarios, strategic, solo system, skirmish)

boardgame.name: Sticky Cthulhu
Липкий Ктулху
boardgame.description:
In Sticky Cthulhu, each player has a long sticky "tentacle", and the table is covered with six types of creature tiles in six colors, along with a few investigator tokens.

To start a round, someone rolls the two dice — one showing a color, the other a creature — then everyone rushes to "grab" the appropriately colored creature tile by slapping it with their tentacle. The round doesn't end until someone removes the tile from their tentacle and holds it in their hand. This player scores a point, then you do it all again.

As you collect "Deep Ones" point tokens, you'll suffer curses that will force you to wield your tentacle in unusual ways. Whoever first scores the predetermined number of points wins!

listing.notes: Shipping via USPS Flat Rate, UPS, or Local Pick up in store (343 S. Robertson Blvd, Beverly Hills, CA 90211) We are an online AND brick and mortar game shop located in the Los Angeles Area. The store is a labor of love between friends and brought to you by avid gamers. We TRULY appreciate your business! - Blue Gnome Games

Brand new copy of the game, in shrink wrap.
Shipping to EU would be 15 euro and the package should arrive in 7-10 days. Elsewhere – please ask!

Opened but never played. Otherwise in NEW condition!
played once

boardgame.name: Ruthless: Stranger with a Gun
boardgame.description:
For decades the Blanco family has run the town of San Luis on the New Mexico border. So, they didn’t take to kindly to John Bannon when he rode into town and made himself the sheriff. Soon the silver mines, saloons and stage-coach were all working for him. Tensions between the Blancos and Bannon were boiling over when a quiet stranger with a wicked gun rode into town. Who will win control of San Luis?

The mini-campaign is loosely based on the film "A Fistful of Dollars" and is structured in quick “acts” that could be played in a single evening.
Both sides face decisions that allow for a great deal of replay value and let the players write their own story in the West....

Players choose their own adventure with one side picking the scenario and the other choosing the set up.
There are a possible 27 different battles that can be played.
The mini-campaign will consist of three of these gunfights.

RUTHLESS, a complete set of western gunfight rules, is also included!
This booklet has everything you need to play!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Eiyo: Fukushuu
boardgame.description: A mini-expansion from the Matchbox Collection Encore set, this adds 2 new Boss cards and a player aid to the base game of Eiyo.

listing.notes:
Payment is possible with Revolut, PayPal, or a bank transfer.
Please ask for shipping :)

boardgame.name: Rebis: Elixir
boardgame.description: This mini-expansion is part of the Matchbox Collection Encore series; it introduces three powerful one-time effects that are obtained when players close one another's shelves.

boardgame.name: Virus Veteran: The Cardgame
boardgame.description:
Virus Veteran is a card game in which it is your goal to have less virus points than your opponents. The card game is split in two kinds of cards, action cards including tourists, mutations, veterans and more... and into standard virus cards. The standard cards will determine your number of points at the end!

To gain the upper hand you can either use tourists and mutations to double the numbers of your opponents points, or you can use medics and lockdowns to block or annihilate aggressive cards of the other players. Bottlenecks and veteran cards allow you to draw cards from your opponents or to get rid of your own virus points.

The single cure card determines the end of the game and boosts your chance to win the game.

The cards are designed in a humoristic comic style which is inspired by the ongoing pandemic. I mean look at the toilet-paper hoarders, aren`t they perfect fitting joker cards?

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Balancing the Scales
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Balancing the Scales is the sixth and final adventure in the Shadows in the Mist campaign.

The Last Breath, a zealous cult of Nurgle, almost wiped out Anvilgard with a deadly plague. Though their plan was stopped, the cult remains and spreads through the city like a cancer. They have waited weeks, and now their plan has come to fruition. Their agents reveal themselves and turn Anvilgard’s own weapons against them. The jungles around the city erupt, and pustulent daemons swarm through the streets. The cult must be stopped, or Anvilgard will be lost forever.

Balancing the Scales follows the events of Aqua Nurglis and sees a party of Soulbound heroes in a desperate fight to save the city of Anvilgard. They must gather their friends and some unlikely allies and do everything in their power to turn back the bloated hordes of Grandfather Nurgle. But something greater and more vile than anything they have encountered awaits, and even the Soulbound may quake in its path…

boardgame.name: Soulbound: Bestiary
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Mortal Realms are besieged. Packs of savage beasts stalk the wilderness. Parades of disquiet dead stirred by baleful magics haunt the nights, enacting terrible vengeance upon the living. Hordes of Orruks, Grots, and Gargants rampage unchecked, driven by little more than destruction and despoilment for their own amusement. And the innumerable servants of the Ruinous Powers that once brought about the end of the world take root wherever mortals tread. The realms are rocked by never-ending conflict and nowhere is truly safe…

The Mortal Realms are filled with countless strange creatures and monstrous beasts. The Warhammer Age of Sigmar Soulbound Bestiary provides a vast collection of these great and terrible foes to use in your Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Soulbound adventures, and gives GMs advice on how best to build exciting encounters with these monstrous and maniacal foes.

The Soulbound Bestiary contains

Over 180 terrifying new foes to use in your Soulbound campaign, including some of the most iconic creatures from Warhammer Age of Sigmar — from the reality-warping Tzeentchian Lord of Change, to the merciless Knight of Shrouds, to the awe-inspiring Kraken-eater Mega-Gargant.
Gamemaster advice on building exciting and memorable encounters, and how to use Doom to give an extra edge to these conflicts.
Detailed descriptions of each creature and faction, including advice on using them in your game, their tactics in combat, and rumours reflecting what the people of the Mortal Realms know of them, some of which may be less than reliable!

boardgame.name: Imposters on Mars
boardgame.description:
Are you a fan of Imposter or Murder Mystery games? Then Imposters On Mars is the perfect game for you. It turns your house (location) into a real-life game board — a colony on Mars. Beware, an Imposter is sabotaging your hard work. Complete jobs and work together to repair the colony. Keep a close eye and figure out who the Imposters are. Vote and cast them out. But be careful not to vote for the wrong person.

Beware, an Imposter is sabotaging your hard work. Complete jobs and work together to repair the colony. Keep a close eye and figure out who the Imposters are. Vote and cast them out. But be careful not to vote for the wrong person.

Your house is now a real-life game board. The rooms in your house (or location) are the game board's spaces where you’ll complete mini-games. These mini-games are called Jobs. Every Player starts with four cards. The first choose a Player’s color. The Player then takes their matching color Vote card. The third card determines who the Imposters are. Finally, every Player chooses a Career and their Job order.

Every room is set up with a mini-game (matching, math, memory, etc.). These mini-games are called Jobs. Players complete Jobs and share proof of completing them. Playing as the Imposter gives you the ability to sabotage Jobs. Imposters are randomly selected. Imposters sabotage Jobs and force Players to freeze their gameplay for a period of time. This allows the Imposter to make a move and kill or deceive players.

Step away from the table and turn your house into a real-life murder mystery party. Turn off the lights and Bring Your Own Flashlight (BYOF) if you dare to play in the dark.

boardgame.name: Dværgekongens grav
Gravkammeret i dværgenes dal
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Et et-etages hulesystem, inspireret af gravkamre fra kongernes dal i Egypten. Hulesystemet er befolket med farlige kæmpedyr, udøde og magiske vogtere. En gruppe skattejægere har for nyligt måtte stikke af fra gravkammeret, da de blev angrebet af mærkelige hunde.

boardgame.name: Paladins of the West Kingdom: Collector's Box
boardgame.description:
From the Paladins: City of Crowns Kickstarter Page:

This deluxe Collector's Box is designed to fit Paladins, City of Crowns, and all additional content, such as promos and metal coins. And yes, it fits sleeved cards. See the photos below. All boards sit together over the wooden components and smaller cards, keeping everything in its place. The box is the same size as the Collector's Box for Raiders of the North Sea (295x295x69mm).

COMPONENTS:
Collector’s Big Box to hold base game and expansion (29x29x69cm)

Vassals Mini-Expansion:
10 small cards (43x66mm):
8 Tavern cards (with yellow Vassals)
1 King’s Favor card (with yellow Vassal)
1 Reference card
8 Vassals (yellow wooden Workers)
